108 {
109  typedef CLoop<CVertex,CEdge, CFace, CHalfEdge> TLoop;

150 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
151 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
152 CLoop<CVertex, CEdge, CFace, CHalfEdge>::CLoop( CBaseMesh<CVertex, CEdge, CFace, CHalfEdge> * pMesh, CHalfEdge * pH )
153 {
154  m_pMesh = pMesh;
155  m_pHalfedge = pH;
156 
157  m_length = 0;
158  CHalfEdge * he = pH;
159  //trace the boundary loop
160  do{
161  CVertex * v = (CVertex*)he->target();
162  he = m_pMesh->vertexMostClwOutHalfEdge( v );
163  m_halfedges.push_back( he );
164  m_length += m_pMesh->edgeLength( (CEdge*)he->edge() );
165  }while( he != m_pHalfedge );
166 }
167 
171 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
172 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
173 CLoop<CVertex, CEdge, CFace, CHalfEdge>::~CLoop()
174 {
175  m_halfedges.clear();
176 }

184 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
185 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
186 void CBoundary<CVertex, CEdge, CFace, CHalfEdge>::_bubble_sort( std::vector<CLoop<CVertex, CEdge, CFace, CHalfEdge>*> & loops)
187 {
188  int i, j, flag = 1; // set flag to 1 to start first pass
189  CLoop<CVertex,CEdge,CFace,CHalfEdge> * temp; // holding variable
190  int numLength = (int)loops.size( );
191  for(i = 1; (i <= numLength) && flag; i++)
192  {
193  flag = 0;
194  for (j=0; j < (numLength -1); j++)
195  {
196  if (loops[j+1]->length() > loops[j]->length() ) // ascending order simply changes to <
197  {
198  temp = loops[j]; // swap elements
199  loops[j] = loops[j+1];
200  loops[j+1] = temp;
201  flag = 1; // indicates that a swap occurred.
202  }
203  }
204  }
205 }
206 
211 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
212 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
213 CBoundary<CVertex, CEdge, CFace, CHalfEdge>::CBoundary( CBaseMesh<CVertex, CEdge, CFace, CHalfEdge> * pMesh )
214 {
215  m_pMesh = pMesh;
216  //collect all boundary halfedges
217  std::set<CHalfEdge*> boundary_hes;
218  for( MeshEdgeIterator<CVertex, CEdge, CFace, CHalfEdge> eiter( m_pMesh); !eiter.end(); eiter ++ )
219  {
220  CEdge * e = *eiter;
221  if( !m_pMesh->isBoundary(e) ) continue;
222 
223  CHalfEdge * he = m_pMesh->edgeHalfedge( e, 0);
224  boundary_hes.insert( he );
225  }
226  //trace all the boundary loops
227  while( !boundary_hes.empty() )
228  {
229  //get the first boundary halfedge
230  typename std::set<CHalfEdge*>::iterator siter = boundary_hes.begin();
231  CHalfEdge * he = *siter;
232  //trace along this boundary halfedge
233  CLoop<CVertex, CEdge, CFace, CHalfEdge> * pL = new CLoop<CVertex, CEdge, CFace, CHalfEdge>( m_pMesh, he );
234  assert(pL);
235  m_loops.push_back( pL );
236  //remove all the boundary halfedges, which are in the same boundary loop as the head, from the halfedge list
237  for( typename std::list<CHalfEdge*>::iterator hiter = pL->halfedges().begin();
238  hiter != pL->halfedges().end(); hiter ++ )
239  {
240  CHalfEdge * he = *hiter;
241  siter = boundary_hes.find( he );
242  if( siter == boundary_hes.end() ) continue;
243  boundary_hes.erase( siter );
244  }
245  }
246 
247  //std::sort( vlps.begin(), vlps.end(), loop_compare<CVertex,CFace,CEdge,CHalfEdge> );
248  _bubble_sort( m_loops );
249 }
250 
253 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
254 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
255 CBoundary<CVertex, CEdge, CFace, CHalfEdge>::~CBoundary()
256 {
257  for( int i = 0; i < (int)m_loops.size(); i ++ )
258  {
259  CLoop<CVertex, CEdge, CFace, CHalfEdge> * pL = m_loops[i];
260  delete pL;
261  }
262 };
263 
268 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
269 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
270 void CLoop<CVertex, CEdge, CFace, CHalfEdge>::write( const char * file_name )
271 {
272  std::ofstream myfile;
273  myfile.open (file_name);
274  for( typename std::list<CHalfEdge*>::iterator hiter = m_halfedges.begin(); hiter != m_halfedges.end(); hiter ++ )
275  {
276  CHalfEdge * pH = *hiter;
277  CVertex * pV = m_pMesh->halfedgeSource(pH);
278  CVertex * pW = m_pMesh->halfedgeTarget(pH);
279  myfile << pV->id() << " " << pW->id() << std::endl;
280  }
281  myfile.close();
282 };
283 
288 //template<typename CVertex, typename CEdge, typename CFace, typename CHalfEdge>
289 template<class CVertex, class CEdge, class CFace, class CHalfEdge> // Added by Dillon 2017/08/22
290 void CLoop<CVertex, CEdge, CFace, CHalfEdge>::read( const char * file_name )
291 {
292  std::ifstream myfile;
293  myfile.open (file_name);
294 
295  if (myfile.is_open())
296  {
297  while ( myfile.good() )
298  {
299  int source, target;
300  myfile >> source >> target;
301  CVertex * pS = m_pMesh->idVertex( source );
302  CVertex * pT = m_pMesh->idVertex( target );
303  CEdge * pE = m_pMesh->vertexEdge( pS, pT );
304  CHalfEdge * pH = m_pMesh->edgeHalfedge(pE,0);
305  m_halfedges.push_back( pH );
306  }
307  myfile.close();
308  }
309 
310 };

313 }
